title: Is there a way to disable "Open File" and "Save Page As" operation from the menu?
content:
Our company is using Firefox. We recently have found that you can launch Command Prompt or PowerShell by typing "cmd" or "powershell" into address bar of "Open File" or "Save Page As" menu.

Since we can not accept this behavior for security reasons, we are considering disabling "Open File" and "Save Page As" feature themselves. Is there a way to realize this?

We sought options to disable these features, but could not find any so far. Or If there is alternative solution for this, that would be highly appreciated if you share your knowledge.
creator: Flagab

title: This page is slowing down Firefox. To speed up your browser, stop this page.
content:
I have an web app I can not control and have to use at work. It constantly all the time every day causes firefox to halt for 10-25 seconds, and displays the black banner with the robot dude "this page is slowing down firefox. to speed up your browser, stop this page".

Restart firefox, removing unnecessary add ons etc I know are the general guidelines.

What I am wondering is is there a log or somewhere specifically in the console/debugger etc I can look to find more information about why it is doing that. I am not a web developer but if I can get some idea about whats causing that I'd have more info to share with the web apps admins.

I can't do anything live, because it really locks up all of firefox but is there a corresponding message afterwards I could look for in the console?
creator: tbv624+firefox

title: Windows taskbar on top of Firefox full screen
content:
I have an oled tv as monitor and Im trying to take of it as much as possible to avoid burning, I switched from Chrome since in full screen it wont let me see the bars when I hover over the top, so far I have everything set up perfectly as I like but 1 thing, its a little bit annoying that I have to exit full screen to access the windows taskbar. So far from what I have searched, its meant to be like that, Im wondering if there's a way to make the taskbar show when I hover over the bottom of the screen.

I appreciate any info that helps me, thanks.
creator: juanpcm

title: my extensions disappeared
content: My extensions disappeared today, for some reason. I added some back to the laptop I was working on, but when I switched to my other one, they were not there. Do extensions not sync? Add-ons are included in items being synced on my settings page. I was hoping to find they never disappeared from that laptop so I could see which ones to add back. I'm on a Windows 10 machine.
creator: docmon67

title: Why is firefox now starting to remove bookmarks from my bookmarks menue.
content: Why is Firefox now starting to remove bookmarks from my bookmarks menu. Several bookmarks have been repeatedly removed from my list. Just understand me, if you have started to sensor bookmarks , i will leave and use another browser. I am very disappointing with this browser. Open source and and a free community to share info. I guess you have also been taken over by big tech. Very sad, I guess it's Good Bye.
creator: axelhgruel

title: Unable to download ANYTHING using Firefox
content: All of a sudden, I am unable to download any type of file using Firefox. Other browsers (Chrome, Safari) work fine. All I get is an immediate "FAILED" message in the download dialog box. Firefox is up to date.
creator: berg

title: No tengo audio
content: Antes de ayer el audio en firefox dejó de funcionar de repente, en el resto de navegadores no tengo este prblema. He probado todo lo de la guía, instalado extensiones que slucinan problemas pero nada. Cuando reproduzco un vídeo comienza a sonar y se para de repente, no sé que hacer pero necesito solucionarlo ya de ya.
creator: andersh.pics

title: New browser install: where's my stuff?
content: When I installed Firefox 88, all my bookmarks disappeared, as well as my history. I use my history often, and rely on FFox to open on my last session. Whoops. How can I recover my history without migrating to another browser?
creator: artrosch
